mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') CREATE_DATE FROM TB_BOARD JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE TB_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, CATEGORY_NO, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, #{boardCategory}, #{userNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_CONTENT FROM TB_BOARD LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND TB_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}, BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ANSWER_NO answerNo, ANSWER_CONTENT answerContent, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') CREATE_DATE createDate, MEMBER_NAME answerWriter FROM TB_ANSWER A JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEMBER_NO = ANSWER_WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND A.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ANSWER_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ANSWER ( ANSWER_NO, ANSWER_CONTENT, BOARD_NO, ANSWER_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANSNO.NEXTVAL, #{answerContent}, #{boardNo}, #{answerWriter} )
